text:
Apple TV + officially launched in Russia
01 Nov 2019, 09:01 by Artyom Bausov
The streaming service Apple TV + with original shows and series has finally started working in Russia.
Topic: Should I subscribe to Apple TV +
There are several projects available at the start:
‚ñ™Ô∏è comedy drama series Morning show with Reese Witherspoon, Jennifer Aniston and Steve Karell‚ñ™Ô∏è science fiction series See with Jason MomoaaÔ∏è dramatic biography Dickinson with Haley Steinfeld and Anna Baryshnikova‚ñ™Ô∏è fantastic drama For the sake of all mankind with Jodal Dalf√∂lur and children‚Äôs program Helper SuppÔ∏è mystical series Epistles of the ghost Snoopy cartoon in space Space Ô∏è Hala drama with Gabriel Luna from the new Terminator series Ô∏è thriller series al House with a servant‚ñ™Ô∏è detective thriller In truth, with Octavia Spencer



To watch TV shows you need the TV application. It is installed by default.
All projects are already available for viewing with Russian subtitles, no dubbing. Subscription price - 199 rubles. per month. For new users, the first 7 days, and for owners of devices purchased after September 10, the first year is provided for free.
In addition, when you apply for a student subscription, you also get full access to Apple TV +.
